H0.text: Plasmogamy is the union of the cytoplasms of two parent mycelia.

H1.text: Plasmology is the union of the cytoplasms of two parent mycelia.

H2.text: Spirogyra is the union of the cytoplasms of two parent mycelia.

H3.text: Xerophyte is the union of the cytoplasms of two parent mycelia.

A4.text: the protoplasm of two parent cells fuse during plasmogamy
